data.title: Jerry Lee Logan Obituary 2020
data.meta_description: Jerry Lee Logan, 81, of Noblesville, passed away on Friday, December 25, 2020 at St. Vincent Hospital in Indianpolis.  He was born on March 24, 1939 to Bernard and Maxine (Hursh...
data.text:
Jerry Lee Logan, 81, of Noblesville, passed away on Friday, December 25, 2020 at St. Vincent Hospital in Indianpolis. He was born on March 24, 1939 to Bernard and Maxine (Hursh) Logan in Lebanon, Indiana.

Jerry was a 1957 graduate of Frankfort High School and proudly served in the United States Navy for 5 years. He was a maintenance supervisor for Delco Electronics for many years. Jerry attended St. Luke's United Methodist Church and was a member of the American Legion. He enjoyed volunteering with Mended Hearts. Jerry liked repairing electronics, fishing, and traveling.

He is survived by his wife, Judy Logan; daughter, Jennifer (Greg) Maiden; son, Robert Logan; daughter, Janet Logan; grandchildren, Ella, Evalyn, and Logan Maiden.

In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by his brother James Logan.

Services will be held at 2:30 pm on Monday, January 4, 2021 at Randall & Roberts Funeral Center, 1685 Westfield Road in Noblesville. Visitation will be from 1:00 pm to the time of service at the funeral home.

Memorial contributions may be made to Humane Society for Hamilton County, 1721 Pleasant Street, Suite B, Noblesville, IN 46060 or the American Heart Association,3816 Paysphere Circle, Chicago, IL 60674.

Condolences: www.randallroberts.com
